dk.pervasive.jcaf
Interface RemoteEntityListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
RemoteEntityListenerImpl, SCAPEntityListener
public interface RemoteEntityListener
extends java.rmi.Remote

Implementations of this interface receives notification about changes to the context of an Entity. This is the RMI Remote interface, to receive notifications across VMs.

Author:
Jakob Bardram
See Also:
EntityListener, Entity, ContextService

Method Summary
 void contextChanged(ContextEvent event)
          Notification about changes in an entity's context information.
